PHRASE.LANG: The Stately Home (Gothic) is the perfect personal apartment space for those people who like the finer things in life with a slightly darker twist. With its large and beautiful grounds and a direct link through to the "Masquerade Ball - The Ballroom (Gothic)", this space is a must-have. Also comes with five free rewards. [#Legal]

Le Manoir (Gothique) constitue l’espace Appartement personnel idéal pour les amateurs de sophistication, avec une touche un peu sombre. Cet espace incontournable comporte de grands et superbes terrains, permettant d’accéder directement à l’espace "Bal masqué – La salle de bal (Gothique)". Il comporte aussi cinq récompenses gratuites. [#Legal]

Das Herrschaftliche Anwesen (Gothic) ist der perfekte persönliche Apartment-Raum für diejenigen, die die etwas dunklere Seite des gehobeneren Lebensstandards zu schätzen wissen. Mit seinen wunderschönen und weitläufigen Außenanlagen und einem direkten Zugang zum "Maskenball - Der Ballsaal (Gothic)" ist dieser Raum ein absolutes Muss. Dazu gibt es fünf Gratis-Belohnungen. [#Legal]

Alle persone cui piace il lato più raffinato della vita, ma con un tocco di tetraggine, la casa signorile (gotica) sembrerà lo spazio perfetto da adibire ad appartamento personale. Il terreno ampio e meraviglioso e il collegamento diretto a "Ballo in maschera - Sala da ballo (gotica)" rendono questo spazio un must. Include anche cinque ricompense gratuite. [#Legal]

El Hogar majestuoso (gótico) es el apartamento personal ideal para aquellos sibaritas amantes de las cosas buenas de la vida, pero con un toque ligeramente más sombrío. Con su grandísimo y hermoso terreno y un enlace directo al Baile de máscaras: “The Ballroom” (gótico), ¡este artículo es imprescindible! Viene con cinco recompensas incluidas. [#Legal]

The Stately Home (Gothic) is the perfect personal apartment space for those people who like the finer things in life with a slightly darker twist. With its large and beautiful grounds and a direct link through to the "Masquerade Ball - The Ballroom (Gothic)", this space is a must-have. Also comes with five free rewards. [#Legal]
